channel.title: Ok i need some npc help
channel.description: for some reason the npcs on my server dont die, their health goes down to zero, but then restarts at a higher health than they had originally, could someone plz post a tut or something to help?

item.title: Ok i need some npc help
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

oo this is easy, go to npc.cfg usually in a cfg folder sometimes not so find it then open up a notepad

drag the npc.cfg onto the notepad it should open up then look for the npcâ€™s id then change the health lower then save on the notepad then compile and woalah!

Read full topic
